data.title: ‘I LOVE YOU.’ 10th ANNIVERSARY EDITION 2xLP + ‘THE LOVE COLLECTION’ 7”
data.meta_description: CELEBRATE THE 10TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE NEIGHBOURHOOD'S DEBUT ALBUM "I LOVE YOU." WITH THE NEW 180G 2LP AS AN RSD ESSENTIAL TITLE. THE NEW EDITION INCLUDES BONUS TRACKS FROM THE EPS "THANK YOU" AND "I'M SORRY..." AS WELL AS THE BAND’S HIT SONGS "SWEATER WEATHER" AND “AFRAID”. THIS SPECIAL EDITION ON THE NBHD STORE IS BUN
data.text:
CELEBRATE THE 10TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE NEIGHBOURHOOD'S DEBUT ALBUM "I LOVE YOU." WITH THE NEW 180G 2LP AS AN RSD ESSENTIAL TITLE. THE NEW EDITION INCLUDES BONUS TRACKS FROM THE EPS "THANK YOU" AND "I'M SORRY..." AS WELL AS THE BAND’S HIT SONGS "SWEATER WEATHER" AND “AFRAID”.

THIS SPECIAL EDITION ON THE NBHD STORE IS BUNDLED WITH A BONUS 7" VINYL PRESSING OF THE LOVE COLLECTION. A HIGHLY SOUGHT-AFTER THREE-SONG EP ORIGINALLY RELEASED IN DECEMBER 2013, THE LOVE COLLECTION FEATURES "WEST COAST," "NO GREY," AND "$TING."

TRACK LISTING:

I LOVE YOU.

LP 1 – SIDE A

HOW

AFRAID

EVERYBODY'S WATCHING ME

SWEATER WEATHER

LP 1 – SIDE B

LET IT GO

ALLEYWAYS

W.D.Y.W.F.M?

LP 2 – SIDE C

FLAWLESS

FEMALE ROBBERY

STAYING UP

FLOAT

LP 2 – SIDE D

A LITTLE DEATH

BABY CAME HOME

WIRES

LEAVING TONIGHT

THE LOVE COLLECTION 7”

SIDE A

WEST COAST

NO GREY

SIDE B
